name: Berserk Breakout
description:
Simple game made for college. 

Theme: Breakout

Controls:

  • Left/Right- Move
  • Space - Choose ball direction
  • Esc - Pause

Rules:

  • Get as many points as you can
  • The game ends when the blocks reach almost the end

Made by:

  • gubebra (https://gubebra.itch.io/)

Sound:

https://tallbeard.itch.io/music-loop-bundle
